ACTION+ Module

Detailed Description

Generic Animation Action Interface

This module is on an early design stage and is not fully documented yet...

No implementation available...

ACTION+ Common Events Codes

Commonly used event codes; meaning provided here is a suggestion only: individual actions may use them differently

enum  ACTION_EVENTS {
  EVENT_UNSUBSCRIBE = 1, EVENT_SUSPENDED, EVENT_RESUMED, EVENT_BEGIN = 0x0100,
  EVENT_END, EVENT_SUCCESS, EVENT_FAIL, EVENT_ABEND,
  EVENT_TICK, EVENT_RTICK, EVENT_MILESTONE, EVENT_COLLISION,
  EVENT_PROXIMITY, EVENT_TOUCH, EVENT_SPECIAL, EVENT_USER = 0x1000
}

ACTION+ Subscription Flags

Flags used in IAction::Subscribe

enum  ACTION_SUBSCRIPTION_FLAGS {
  ACTION_ANY = 0x00, ACTION_EQ = 0x01, ACTION_LTE = 0x02, ACTION_GTE = 0x03,
  ACTION_AUTO = 0x00, ACTION_ONCE = 0x10, ACTION_MANUAL = 0x20, ACTION_MORITURI = 0x30,
  ACTION_WEAKPTR = 0x40, ACTION_NOTIME = 0x80, ACTION_CALL = 0x0000, ACTION_RESUME = 0x0100,
  ACTION_SUSPEND = 0x0200, ACTION_MASK_TRIGGER = 0x03, ACTION_MASK_LTE_GTE = 0x02, ACTION_MASK_MODE = 0x30,
  ACTION_MASK_USE = 0x0300, ACTION_RESERVED_1 = 0x04, ACTION_RESERVED_2 = 0x08, ACTION_RESERVED_3 = 0x0400,
  ACTION_RESERVED_4 = 0x0800
}

ACTION+ Module-Specific Error Codes

Error codes used by classes in this module only

enum  ACTION_ERRORS { ACTION_E_CANNOTSUBSCRIBE = FW_E_CLASS_ERRORS, ACTION_E_CANNOTSETUP, ACTION_E_INVALIDPERIOD }

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ACTION_EVENTS
 

Enumeration values:
EVENT_UNSUBSCRIBE  Unsubscribe called (no subscription required).
EVENT_SUSPENDED  Suspend called (no subscription required).
EVENT_RESUMED  Resume called (no subscription required).
EVENT_BEGIN  beginning of the action perform
EVENT_END  end of the action perform
EVENT_SUCCESS  achieving something successfully; notice that the action may be continued afterwards
EVENT_FAIL  failing to do something; notice that the action may be continued afterwards
EVENT_ABEND  abnormal end
EVENT_TICK  clock tick
EVENT_RTICK  reversed clock tick
EVENT_MILESTONE  something important; a mile stone
EVENT_COLLISION  collision detected
EVENT_PROXIMITY  proximity detected
EVENT_TOUCH  touch occurred; touching is differs from colliding in that it is desired
EVENT_SPECIAL  special event...
EVENT_USER  with this code user-defined codes start

Definition at line 25 of file actionplus.idl.

enum ACTION_SUBSCRIPTION_FLAGS
 

Enumeration values:
ACTION_ANY  Trigger the event regardless of SubCode / Trigger values (see ACTION_EVENT and ACTION_SUBS).
ACTION_EQ  Trigger the event only if SubCode == Trigger value (see ACTION_EVENT and ACTION_SUBS).
ACTION_LTE  Trigger the event only if SubCode <= Trigger value (see ACTION_EVENT and ACTION_SUBS).
ACTION_GTE  Trigger the event only if SubCode >= Trigger value (see ACTION_EVENT and ACTION_SUBS).
ACTION_AUTO  Unsubscribes action automatically when IsAlive returns FALSE.
ACTION_ONCE  Unsubscribes action after first time it is triggered.
ACTION_MANUAL  Imposes the action to be unsubscribed manually.
ACTION_MORITURI  Reserved for internal use by IAction::Die function.
ACTION_WEAKPTR  Imposes the subscribers pointer to be weak - no AddRef / Release calls - to avoid auto-references.
ACTION_NOTIME  Set this flag to prevent default operations on SubCodes to replace TimeStamp value - will cause TimeStamp to be always the real time.
ACTION_CALL  Triggers regular HandleEvent call.
ACTION_RESUME  Triggers IAction::Resume function call.
ACTION_SUSPEND  Triggers IAction::Suspend function call.
ACTION_MASK_TRIGGER  Mask for Trigger Mode values: ACTION_ANY, ACTION_EQ, ACTION_LTE and ACTION_GTE.
ACTION_MASK_LTE_GTE  (ACTION_LTE | ACTION_GTE) & ~ACTION_ANY & ~ACTION_EQ
ACTION_MASK_MODE  Mask for Unsubscription Mode values: ACTION_AUTO, ACTION_ONCE, ACTION_MANUAL and ACTION_MORITURI.
ACTION_MASK_USE  Mask for Usage values: ACTION_CALL, ACTION_RESUME and ACTION_SUSPEND.
ACTION_RESERVED_1  Reserved for internal use.
ACTION_RESERVED_2  Reserved for internal use.
ACTION_RESERVED_3  Reserved for internal use.
ACTION_RESERVED_4  Reserved for internal use.

Definition at line 51 of file actionplus.idl.

enum ACTION_ERRORS
 

Enumeration values:
ACTION_E_CANNOTSUBSCRIBE  Action cannot subscribe for the given event.
ACTION_E_CANNOTSETUP  Action cannot set-up for the given verb.
ACTION_E_INVALIDPERIOD  Invalid value for action period.

Definition at line 85 of file actionplus.idl.

enum ACTION_ENVELOPE
 

Enumeration values:
ACTION_ENV_REWRITE_FROM_SENDER  default value: tries to copy the envelope from the sender or originator of the event
ACTION_ENV_NONE  no envelope; velocity is constant
ACTION_ENV_PARA  parabolic envelope (acceleration is constant), provide ease-in, ease-out as fractions of 1 (e.g. 0.1, 0.85)
ACTION_ENV_SIN  sinusoidal envelope (pseudo-jerk), provide ease-in, ease-out as fractions of 1 (e.g. 0.1, 0.85)
ACTION_ENV_PARA_TIME  as ACTION_ENV_PARA, ease-in and ease-out specified in miliseconds
ACTION_ENV_SIN_TIME  as ACTION_ENV_SIN, ease-in and ease-out specified in miliseconds
ACTION_ENV_PHYSICAL  motion specified using the distance, max speed, max acceleration and jerk
